author: ewhitesides
body:

comments.author: msftclas
comments.body:
This seems like a small (but important) contribution, so no Contribution License Agreement is required at this point. We will now review your pull request.
_Thanks,
Microsoft Pull Request Bot_

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body:
First, thanks for this contribution, we desperately needed to put these instructions in docs. 

I went ahead and made a few ordering changes to showcase the repository installation method as the preferred method. However, it looks like another PR came in and did the same before this one got merged. I'm going to fix the merge conflict here as well.

comments.author: joeyaiello
comments.body: Alright, I made a few more wording changes when fixing the merge commit. I still need to do a pass here at some point on the whole doc, but it's absolutely in a better place than it was a week ago. :smile:

title: Included info on Microsoft Repository
